name: Silver Edge
description: Once used to slay an unjust king, only to have the kingdom erupt into civil war in the aftermath.

abilities.name: Shadow Walk
abilities.description: The wielder becomes invisible and gains a movement speed bonus. Grants phase movement while invisible. The attack breaking invisibility has True Strike and deals physical spell damage bonus with the attack, and also breaks the target's passive abilities.
notes: Does not interrupt the wielder's channeling abilities upon cast
Recasting the ability refreshes the buff duration
The caster gains phased movement while invisible
Picking up, dropping, or selling items does not break the invisibility
During the fade time, casting abilities or items does not break the invisibility
The attack also applies Break on the target
Does not affect Buildings or Ward-type units
Shares cooldown with other invisibility items

additionalInfo: This item is shown as a Team Item in the shop window when purchased by an ally
Break mechanic has no effect on opponents' items
Consider purchasing against troubling passives like Immaterial, Berserker's Blood, Fury Swipes, Bristleback, Untouchable and Dispersion
Abilities using stacks are only prevented from gaining or placing new stacks, existing stacks can still function until they expire
